Uses of Package
org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery

  • Packages that use org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.configuration
    Contains configuration-related classes.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery
    Contains APIs for topology manager SPI.
    org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp
    Contains default TCP/IP implementation for discovery SPI.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery used by org.apache.ignite.configuration 
    Class and Description
    DiscoverySpi
    Grid discovery SPI allows to discover remote nodes in grid.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery used by org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery 
    Class and Description
    DiscoveryMetricsProvider
    Provides metrics to discovery SPI.
    DiscoverySpiCustomMessage
    Message to send across ring.
    DiscoverySpiDataExchange
    Handler for initial data exchange between Ignite nodes.
    DiscoverySpiListener
    Listener for grid node discovery events.
    DiscoverySpiNodeAuthenticator
    Node authenticator.
  • Classes in org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery used by org.apache.ignite.spi.discovery.tcp 
    Class and Description
    DiscoveryMetricsProvider
    Provides metrics to discovery SPI.
    DiscoverySpi
    Grid discovery SPI allows to discover remote nodes in grid.
    DiscoverySpiCustomMessage
    Message to send across ring.
    DiscoverySpiDataExchange
    Handler for initial data exchange between Ignite nodes.
    DiscoverySpiHistorySupport
    This annotation is for all implementations of DiscoverySpi that support topology snapshots history.
    DiscoverySpiListener
    Listener for grid node discovery events.
    DiscoverySpiNodeAuthenticator
    Node authenticator.
    DiscoverySpiOrderSupport
    This annotation is for all implementations of DiscoverySpi that support proper node ordering.
